blogPost.excerpt: Corrily optimizes prices and discounts for subscription and usage-based companies. By copying a few lines of code, you can run experiments to find better prices, localize them to the user, and boost growth and retention.
blogPost.body: Corrily optimizes prices and discounts for subscription and usage-based companies. By copying a few lines of code, you can run experiments to find better prices, localize them to the user, and boost growth and retention.
blogPost.title: Corrily - Price localization and optimization for SaaS companies
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Corrily为订阅和使用型公司优化价格和折扣。通过复制几行代码，你可以运行实验来寻找更好的价格，将其本地化到用户，并促进增长和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企业的价格本地化和优化

localize.description: Corrily爲訂閱和使用型公司優化價格和折扣。通過複製幾行代碼，你可以運行實驗來尋找更好的價格，將其本地化到用戶，並促進增長和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企業的價格本地化和優化
